features: PROTECT GLASS BABY BOTTLES. Sleeves help protect Dr. Brown’s glass bottles against breakage while in use, while sterilizing, or while in the dishwasher.

EASY TO USE. Sleeve slides on quickly simply by wetting the inside of the sleeve and outside of the bottle. See-through back panel allows you to see measurements and feed baby without removing the sleeve.
GLOWS IN THE DARK. Silicone Sleeves glow in the dark, just expose to light - making it easy to see for those late-night feeds.
EASY TO CLEAN. Sleeve can be removed, but doesn’t need to be to clean, sterilize, or when in the dishwasher.
EASY TO GRIP SLEEVE. The fitted silicone sleeve is grippy, making it easy to hold eco-friendly glass baby bottles and keep them safe.
FLEXIBLE AND DURABLE. Soft, flexible silicone sleeves are durable, withstanding stretching and distorting from use.
GLASS BABY BOTTLE. Sleeves come in sizes for Dr. Brown’s 4 oz, 8 oz, 5 oz, and 9 oz glass bottles.
DISHWASHER SAFE. One-piece 100% silicone sleeves are dishwasher (top rack only) and sterilizer safe. BPA free. 0m+
body.description: Protect your glass baby bottles with Dr. Brown’s® Silicone Glass Bottle Sleeves. The 100% silicone baby bottle sleeve helps protect Dr. Brown’s® Options+™ Glass Bottles from breakage while in use, while sterilizing, or while in the dishwasher. The see-through panel for measurements on the back allows you to measure and feed baby without removing the sleeve. Silicone Sleeves glow in the dark, just expose to light - making it easy to see for those late-night feeds. Sleeve is removable but isn’t necessary to remove from the bottle to clean or sterilize, or while in the dishwasher. While using eco-friendly Glass Bottles, the fitted, easy-grip Silicone Sleeve is the perfect solution to keep your bottles safe. The soft and flexible silicone sleeve is durable – withstanding stretching from use. Sleeves come in sizes for Dr. Brown’s 4 oz, 8 oz, 5 oz, and 9 oz glass bottles. Silicone Sleeves are safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. 0m+. BPA free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful. I had actually spoken to a Dr. Brown’s representative because my glass bottles were fading and she said that these sleeves have to be on there for them not to fade. After I put these on there, the bottles haven’t faded, they’re super durable when dropped and they come in cute colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect - I appreciate the slight glow in the dark feature
reviews.reviewText: Obviously they fit and do what they are meant to do, protect the bottle. I appreciate the thoughtful design with the window to see the oz/ml level.It's easier to get them on and off than the instructions would have you believe. I did not need soap to slip it on or off. I can do without anything or worse case a little water does the trick.I particularly appreciate the glow in the dark property of the blue swirl sleeve... for making bottles or using them in the middle of the night with the lights low or off, this is excellent. It is not much glow, very subtle, but just enough for me to see it and that's all I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How to Use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this silicone cover for the glass bottles! Attached is a video showing the easiest way I’ve found to both put it on and take it off. Hoping it helps others as it took me a lot of trial and error to get it right.The key to getting it on is pushing down then pulling back up to push down again. The key to getting it off is to twist the bottle in the opposite direction from the sleeve as you pull apart.My daughter drops (throws) her bottle on our tile floor a LOT and these have saved countless bottles from shattering. Only once when she dropped it from her high chair did it actually break and this cover saved me from having to clean up any glass as it stayed within the silicone.These are easily hand washed in the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very secure grip
reviews.reviewText: Helps protect glass and feels safer. Love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars "Glow in the Dark" is the only colorway worth getting.
reviews.reviewText: These silicone sleeves are essential if you use glass bottles and have hard floors. I've dropped two bottles onto tile, and both have survived thanks to these sleeves.I have every color, but I wish I would have just bought glow in the dark. It's the only one that has a fully transparent window where you can see how much milk you're adding. The other colors are almost fully opaque, which is frustrating when you're measuring formula for your screaming baby at 3am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It will not fit evenflo glass baby bottles, it’s way to big for them. It’s made specifically for Dr Brown bottles. I returned it but went ahead a gave a five star review because the quality was excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to keep glass bottles from breaking if dropped- but realized it was better used to help insulate a heated glass bottle as well as help from burning hands on the hot glass. Did not keep bottle from breaking when it fell off the counter though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to clean and keep clean. Very easy to put on and take off.

I love these sleeves! I have glass dr browns bottles and these make them so much better! Less slippery for my baby to hold and helps not to break as easy if they fall. I wish I would have had them sooner.
Excelente el silicón; aún no se me caen los bibis con la funda puesta, así que, aún, no he probado su residencia /función.
It’s a little expensive for what it is. But fits all browns bottles and keeps the glass from breaking
